document.full_text: he was the butt of some controversial sparring at the golden globes for his role in "the tourist," but johnny depp doesn't seem to have taken ricky gervais's high-profile ribbing to heart.
document.title: johnny depp to appear on ricky gervais sitcom
lines_and_colors: he was the butt of some controversial sparring at the golden globes for his role in "the tourist," but johnny depp doesn't seem to have taken ricky gervais's high-profile ribbing to heart.
